utterances.name: user
utterances.text: なぜタイタニックは沈んだのですか？

utterances.name: agent
utterances.text: タイタニックは、ベルファストのハーランド＆ウルフ社によってホワイトスター・ラインのために造られた客船でした。処女航海は1912年4月10日に始まりました。タイタニックは4月14日午後11時40分に氷山に衝突し、2時間45分後の午前2時20分に沈没しました。船体は2時間浮いていましたが、最終的には1500人以上の乗客・乗員とともに海の下に沈んでしまいました。706人生存者のうち、最後の一人は4月15日に海から引き上げられました。

en.name: user
en.text: Why did the  titanic sink?

en.name: agent
en.text: The RMS Titanic was a passenger ship built for the White Star Line by Harland & Wolff, Belfast. Its maiden voyage started on 10 April 1912. Titanic hit an iceberg at 11:40 p.m. on 14 April, and sank two hours and forty-five minutes later at 2:20 a.m. The hull of the ship stayed afloat for two hours before finally sinking beneath the waves, with over 1,500 passengers and crew. On 15 April, the first of 706 people were rescued, with the final survivor pulled from the water on 15 April.

en.name: user
en.text: How can I make homemade peanut butter?

en.name: agent
en.text:
Here are some ideas:

-   -First you’ll want to grind up some peanuts into a paste.  Then add some sort of liquid to them, such as honey, oil, or water, and combine them until they stick together. 
-   -Try different types of pastes with different kinds of liquid, and maybe try something with a sweeter liquid, such as molasses or brown sugar, instead of honey or oil.
-   -If you try a honey or oil paste, you may need to add more liquid as it sets, to make it smoother.  You could try adding a little flour or cornstarch, to thicken the mixture.
-   -If you use a “gluten-free” brand of flour, this may not thicken the peanut butter very well, so you might add a little more liquid, or use a little more powdered peanut butter to get a spreadable consistency.

utterances.text: 現代の建物には、ガーゴイルが姿を消していることに気がつきました。なぜ、昔の西洋の建物にはガーゴイルがあったのでしょうか？

utterances.name: agent
utterances.text: 教会や大聖堂などでよく見られるガーゴイルは、雨水を排出する雨どいの目的の、中世にまでさかのぼる建築的要素です。ガーゴイルの幻想的でグロテスクな彫刻は、魔除けの意味を持つと解釈されることもあるようです。その後何世紀にもわたって、ガーゴイルは装飾のために一般的な建物で使用されるようになりました。しかし現代では、一般建築ではほとんど見かけることはありません。

en.name: user
en.text: I've noticed that gargoyle architecture has disappeared in modern building construction. Why did builders used to have gargoyles on their buildings?

en.name: agent
en.text: Gargoyles and grotesques are architectural elements dating back to medieval times, with the original purpose of water runoff protection for churches. In subsequent centuries gargoyles also came to be used in secular buildings for decorative purposes, with these fantastic and grotesque sculptures sometimes interpreted as demonic spirits warding off evil. In modern times, gargoyles have only retained their decorative function, but have largely fallen out of architectural vernacular.

utterances.text: ロードランナーはどんな動物ですか？

utterances.name: agent
utterances.text: ロードランナーは、「オオミチバシリ」とも呼ばれる、北米のソノラ砂漠に生息する鳥です。スピードと俊敏性でよく知られており、トカゲ、昆虫、小動物などを捕食します。ロードランナーは一般に12〜15インチほどの大きさで、細長い首、長い細い脚、尖ったくちばしを持っています。飛ぶことは得意でなく、主に地上を移動する鳥です。ロードランナーは大きな目で、獲物や捕食者を簡単に見つけることができます。

en.name: user
en.text: What kind of animal is the roadrunner?

en.name: agent
en.text: The roadrunner is an animal native to the Sonoran desert of North America.  It is best known for its speed and agility, allowing it to run down and catch many types of smaller animals, such as lizards, insects, and small rodents.  Roadrunners are generally 12-15 inches tall, with elongated necks, long slender legs, and pointed beaks.  They are primarily ground-dwelling birds, but they are also able to maneuver easily on trees and shrubs.  Roadrunners are notable for their large eyes, allowing them to easily spot prey and potential predators.

utterances.text: Airbnbには、ホストが物件掲載を作成・管理する正式な手順があります。ホストになりたい場合は、まず物件を設定し、Airbnbで身元を確認する必要があります。その後、旅行者からの予約を受け付けることができるようになります。物件を設定するには、有効なEメールアドレスと社会保障番号または納税者番号が必要で、住まいの場所と物件名も必要です。また、喫煙を許可しないことや、家に煙探知器があることを示すなど、旅行者にとって安全な場所であることを確認する必要があります。Airbnbへの物件掲載は無料です。掲載後、旅行者からの予約を受け付け、支払いを受け取り、ゲストとコミュニケーションを取ることができるようになります。

en.name: agent
en.text:
Airbnb has a formal process where hosts create and manage listings. If you want to host, you will first need to set up a listing and verify your identity on Airbnb. You will then be able to accept reservations from travelers.

To set up a listing, you need to have a valid email address and a social security number or tax ID number. You will be asked about your location and the name of your property. You will also need to verify that your home will be a safe place for travelers, such as showing that you won’t allow smoking and that your home has a working smoke detector. Creating your listing on Airbnb is free. You will then be able to accept reservations from travelers, receive payments for hosting, and communicate with guests.

I hope that helps!

You’re referring to Hanukkah, which is a Jewish holiday that’s celebrated each year during December and is one of the High Holy days.  I don’t believe I know of a solid definition of “general framework of the holiday”, but there are some basic elements to it.

The Jewish day begins at sunset.  Generally, it’s not celebrated on other days of the week.  On Hanukkah, a candle is lit every night for each night of the holiday.  It’s not a holiday of fasting.

utterances.name: user

utterances.text:
ウォーキングはどんな人にもお勧めの優れた有酸素運動で、バランスのとれた健康的なライフスタイルの主要な要素です。毎週少なくとも計150分程度のウォーキングをお勧めします。定期的に運動している人は、さまざまな慢性疾患のリスクが低いとされており、定期的なウォーキングは、より活発で健康的な人生を過ごすために有効的です。活動的で健康的になるために、以下の事をお勧めします。：

毎日30分以上、早歩きのような有酸素運動を行います。調子のよい日は追加で運動し、色々な運動を組み合わせて考えてみましょう。

ウォーキングのルートを変更してみましょう。道に変化が出る事で運動量を増やすことができ、また、新しい風景を楽しめます。

仲間を見つけましょう。 友人や家族など、他の人と一緒にハイキング、ランニング、サイクリングをすると、運動の楽しさが倍増し、励ましあって運動が長続きします。

en.name: user
en.text: How many steps should I try to walk each day?

en.name: agent
en.text:
Walking is an excellent form of exercise and is a major component of a balanced and healthy lifestyle. It is recommended that all adults aim to aim to get at least 150 minutes of moderate physical activity, including brisk walking, each week. People with higher activity levels are also at lower risk for a range of deadly and chronic diseases, and regular walking is an excellent way to adopt a more active, healthy lifestyle. Here are some steps you can take to become an active, healthy person:

  Commit to daily weight-bearing cardio exercise, like brisk walking for at least 30 minutes most days of the week.  Try to include some days where you include additional exercise (as long as you feel comfortable), and consider a combination of different activities throughout the week.

  Mix up your routine!  Building and varying your walking route both provides new sights to enjoy and increases the challenge of your exercise, leading to a more rewarding walking experience.

  Find a companion!  Hiking, running, or biking with others, especially friends or family, can greatly enhance your enjoyment of exercise and help you stay accountable to your commitment.

The above information is intended for general knowledge only and does not constitute any medical advice.

en.name: agent
en.text: Sure, let me see if I can sum it up!  What comes to mind is that New England is characterized by being more modest and reserved than other parts of the country, and the preppy lifestyle reflects this.  Instead of being in your face, preppy people take a more thoughtful, low-key approach.  So they're self-conscious about image and status, but they keep a poker face, since they don’t want to appear like they're showy.  For example, they might be talking to someone in a fancy restaurant, and when someone cuts in line, they would remain polite and polite while internally cringing about being snubbed.  They wouldn't do anything to disrupt the system or cause a scene.  It’s the opposite of California, where people wear all the jewelry and big hair and flashy shoes that they want, because they don't mind drawing attention to themselves and see self-promotion as a virtue.

en.name: user
en.text: Can you explain the steps in the combustion process of a gasoline engine?

en.name: agent
en.text: Sure, here’s how that works. The air-fuel mixture is pushed into the cylinder, with a piston at the top, and a spark plug. The piston compresses the air-fuel mixture, and as it reaches a high pressure, the spark plug fires and ignites the mixture. When it is ignited, it pushes the piston down, forcing the exhaust out of the cylinder.

en.name: user
en.text: How can I make bone broth?

en.name: agent
en.text: It’s a great way to get essential nutrients, and it’s also a delicious way to use up the parts of meat that you wouldn’t otherwise eat, such as the bones. To make bone broth, simply add bones to a large pot of water and simmer for around 12 to 36 hours — longer if possible. During this time you should be skimming the top of the broth frequently. The broth will slowly transform into something thicker and more flavorful. The final broth can be kept in the refrigerator and used as a base for soups, stews, and other dishes.

en.name: user
en.text: What causes a heart attack

en.name: agent
en.text:
A heart attack is usually caused by a blood clot that forms in one of the arteries that supply blood to the heart.  This blockage can cause a shortage of blood and oxygen to the heart, which can lead to a heart attack.  Some risk factors for heart attack include:

1.  High blood pressure
2.  Diabetes
3.  Smoking
4.  Family history of heart disease
5.  Lack of physical activity

utterances.text: 痛くないように眉毛を抜くにはどうすればよいですか？

utterances.name: agent
utterances.text: ピンセットを使って、毛の流れに従って素早く抜いてください。事前に氷などで冷やしておくと、痛みを感じにくくなるかもしれません。

en.name: user
en.text: how do i pluck my eyebrows without hurting?

en.name: agent
en.text: The best way to minimize pain is to not pluck at all, as it will not grow back thicker and thicker until it’s relatively painless to pluck.  It would also be unwise to pluck all your hair off, as you may experience both hair loss (since you’ll be unable to grow new hair without the help of the hair you plucked) and hair thinning (as the roots will be gone).  However, the most painful way to do this is to yank the eyebrow hair out with tweezers.  This does not take very long, but it is incredibly painful.

machine_translated_ja.name: user
machine_translated_ja.text: 傷つけずに眉毛を摘むにはどうすればよいですか？

machine_translated_ja.name: agent
machine_translated_ja.text: 痛みを最小限に抑える最良の方法は、まったく摘み取らないことです。なぜなら、それは、引き抜くのが比較的痛くなるまで、厚くて厚くなっていないからです。また、両方の脱毛を経験する可能性があるため（髪の毛の助けを借りずに新しい髪を育てることができないため）、髪を薄くして（根がなくなると）両方の脱毛を経験する可能性があるため、髪を脱ぐのも賢明ではありません。。ただし、これを行う最も痛い方法は、ピンセットで眉毛を引き抜くことです。これにはそれほど時間はかかりませんが、非常に苦痛です。

meta.memo: 原文にかなり補足している
